title: Multicast
summary: Update on the Multicast Community Group activities: brief review of motivation and purpose, an overview of [draft-jholland-quic-multicast](https://grumpyoldtroll.github.io/draft-jholland-quic-multicast/draft-jholland-quic-multicast.html) and status on the [aioquic](https://github.com/MaxF12/aioquic) implementation, and discussion of the path to browser adoption.
goals: give a status update, gather feedback
